body:
Comment 1: 
i think it's accepted practice that a test could reference the testdata directory using
relative pathname.

in fact, i think most of the package tests use this and all of them couldn't be run
outside their source directory.

i thought of providing a special function like testing.TestDataDir for this task, but
i couldn't think of a good way to implement it (unless the go tool embed that directory
into every test binary).
